tools.name: architecture_check
tools.description: Validates code architecture according to project standards, checking for component organization, naming conventions, and proper use of React patterns in Next.js 15.2.4.

path.description: The path to check. Defaults to the project root.

tools.name: dependency_check
tools.description: Validates project dependencies against policy, ensuring consistent versioning and preventing problematic imports.

path.description: The path to check. Defaults to the project root.

tools.name: check_import_allowed
tools.description: Checks if an import from one module to another is allowed according to the project's architecture rules.

source.description: The source module or file path.

target.description: The target module or file path being imported.

tools.name: style_check
tools.description: Validates code style according to project ESLint and Prettier rules.

path.description: The path to check. Defaults to the project root.

tools.description: Checks a specific file for style issues according to project standards.

filePath.description: The path to the file to check.
